email_content:
Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m excited that we’re getting closer to officially launching the joint counseling initiative between Helping Hands Alliance and our team.

Where we stand so far:
• Volunteer roster – 18 counselors have confirmed on our side; I’ll share the draft list for your review.
• Training – I’d like to run two virtual, 2-hour sessions during the week of 10 June and an in-person workshop on Saturday, 15 June at your community center.
• Curriculum – we plan to blend our general-advice framework with the trauma-informed guidelines your team provided.

Next steps:
1. Could you look over the volunteer list and let me know of any additions or gaps by Tuesday, 4 June?
2. Please confirm if the proposed training dates work for your staff, or suggest alternatives.
3. Once the schedule is locked, we’ll circulate the final program outline and outreach materials.

I’d also like to set up a 30-minute check-in early next week. My availability is:
• Mon 3–4 pm ET
• Tue 10–11 am ET
• Wed 1–2 pm ET
Feel free to pick whichever slot works best and send an invite.

Thanks again for partnering with us—together we’ll make a real impact in the community.

Best,
Alex
[Your Organization]
(555)-123-4567
